rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with Art Deco elements and Vastu-compliant directional alignment.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area combined with dining, featuring modern Art Deco finishes and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully integrated open-plan kitchen adjacent to living area with modern appliances and Art Deco accents.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for formal dining with comfortable seating and Art Deco detailing.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious guest room with Art Deco furniture and Vastu-friendly layout.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Guest)
rooms.description: Attached to the guest bedroom, ensuring privacy and compliance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for laundry and storage, designed to be unobtrusive yet functional in Art Deco style.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large, inviting entrance door with Art Deco detailing and security features.

openings.name: Window A1
openings.description: Large window in the living area to allow maximum natural light while maintaining privacy.

openings.name: Window A2
openings.description: Kitchen windows designed for ventilation and light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom and extensive natural light, designed with Art Deco influences.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom complementing the master bedroom, ensuring privacy and luxury in design.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with Art Deco detailing that respects Vastu directions for personal growth and harmony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed with comfort in mind, following local design norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area with state-of-the-art equipment, soundproofing, and a design that complements the farmhouse aesthetic.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: A versatile space for work or study, incorporating Art Deco motifs with ergonomic furniture.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: A small balcony adjoining the master bedroom for relaxation and fresh air.

openings.name: Staircase Window
openings.description: Window adjacent to staircase providing light to upper levels while maintaining privacy.

notes: The design incorporates local building norms and Vastu principles to enhance functionality, aesthetics, and energy flow in the farmhouse. The plan emphasizes open spaces on the ground floor for social interaction, while ensuring privacy and tranquility on the upper levels.
